short_description: DATCOM | Fully Managed, service focused IT for Small, Medium and Large Enterprise About us Established in 2011, we’re based in the East Midlands and are trusted by customers nationwide.
long_description: DATCOM | Fully Managed, service focused IT for Small, Medium and Large Enterprise About us Established in 2011, we’re based in the East Midlands and are trusted by customers nationwide. We’ve been providing IT services since 2011, although as a team we have been together since 1998, and we take pride in the quality of our service. We’re experts in fully managed IT services, secure internet connections, cloud services and secure business communications.
